title: 一些代码优化技巧
content:
1. 判断多个平行条件

可以将参与判断的多个条件存为一个数组，使用数组的 includes 方法判断

// longhand
if (x === 'abc' || x === 'def' || x === 'ghi' || x === 'jkl') {
  /*** some code ***/
}

// shorthand
if (['abc', 'def', 'ghi', 'jkl'].includes(x)) {
  /*** some code ***/
}

2. 简单的 if ... else

对于不包含大量逻辑代码的判断，可以使用三元来判断。

// longhand
var test: boolean;

if (x > 100) {
  test = true;
} else {
  test = false;
}

// shorthand
var test = x > 100 ? true : false;

console.log(test);

当有嵌套的条件时:

var x = 300,
  test2 =
    x > 100
      ? 'greater than 100'
      : x < 50
      ? 'less than 50'
      : 'between 50 and 100';

console.log(test2); // 'greater than 100'

3. 声明变量

当声明多个具有普通类型和普通值的变量时

// longhand
let test1 = 1;
let test2 = 1;

// shorthand
let test1,
  test2 = 1;

// longhand
let test1: boolean;
let test2: boolean;

// shorthand
let test1, test2: boolean;

4. null, undefined和空值判断

// longhand
if (test1 !== null || test1 !== undefined || test1 !== '') {
  var test2 = test1;
}

// shorthand
var test2 = test1 || '';

5. null 检查并赋默认值

var test1 = null,
  test2 = test1 || '';

console.log('null check', test2); // output: '' (an empty string)

6. undefined 检查并赋默认值

var test1 = undefined,
  test2 = test1 || '';

console.log('undefined check', test2); // output: '' (an empty string)

7. 多个变量赋值

// longhand
let test1, test2, test3;
test1 = 1;
test2 = 2;
test3 = 3;

// shorthand
let [test1, test2, test3] = [1, 2, 3];

8. 运算符简化

// longhand
test1 = test1 + 1;
test2 = test2 - 1;
test3 = test3 * 10;

// shorthand
test1++;
test2--;
test3 * = 10;

9. 真值判断

虽然平时常用，但仍值得一提

// longhand
if (test1 === true) {
}

// shorthand
if (test1) {
}

相反的判断:

// longhand
var test1;
if (test1 !== true) {
  // do something
}

// shorthand
var test1;
if (!test1) {
  // do something
}

10. AND(&&) 操作符判断条件

如果只在条件为真时才调用函数

// longhand
if (test1) {
  callMethod();
}

// shorthand
test1 && callMethod();

11. foreach 循环

// longhand
for (var i = 0; i < testData.length; i++)

// shorthand
for (var i in testData)
function testData(element, index, array) {
  console.log('test[' + index + '] = ' + element);
}

[1, 2, 3].forEach(testData);
// logs: test[0] = 1, test[1] = 2, test[2] = 3

12. 条件判断返回

// longhand
if (!(test == undefined)) {
  return test;
} else {
  return callMe('test');
}

// shorthand
return ret || callMe('test');

13. 箭头函数

// longhand
function add(test1, test2) {
  return test1 + test2;
}

// shorthand
const add = (test1, test2) => test1 + test2;
function callMe(name) {
  console.log('Hello', name);
}

callMe = (name) => console.log('Hello', name);

14. 缩短函数调用

使用三元运算符

// longhand
function test1() {
  console.log('test1');
}

function test2() {
  console.log('test2');
}

var test3 = 1;
if (test3 == 1) {
  test1();
} else {
  test2();
}

// shorthand
(test3 === 1 ? test1 : test2)();

15. switch 函数调用

// longhand
switch (data) {
  case 1:
    test1();
    break;
  case 2:
    test2();
    break;
  case 3:
    test();
    break;
  // And so on ...
}

// shorthand
var data = {
  1: test1,
  2: test2,
  3: test,
};

data[something] && data[something]();

16. 隐式返回

使用箭头函数特性

// longhand
function calcCircumference(diameter) {
  return Math.PI * diameter;
}

// shorthand
calcCircumference = (diameter) => Math.PI * diameter;

17. 科学计数

// longhand
for (var i = 0; i < 10000; i++) { ... }

// shorthand
for (var i = 0; i < 1e4; i++) { ... }

18. 参数默认值

// longhand
function add(test1, test2) {
  if (test1 === undefined) test1 = 1;
  if (test2 === undefined) test2 = 2;
  return test1 + test2;
}

// shorthand
add = (test1 = 1, test2 = 2) => test1 + test2;

add(); // output: 3

19. 对象扩展符

// longhand
const data = [1, 2, 3];
const test = [4, 5, 6].concat(data);

// shorthand
const data = [1, 2, 3];
const test = [4, 5, 6, ...data];
console.log(test); // [4, 5, 6, 1, 2, 3];

拷贝

// longhand
const test1 = [1, 2, 3];
const test2 = test1.slice();

// shorthand
const test1 = [1, 2, 3];
const test2 = [...test1];

20. 模板字符串

// longhand
const welcome = 'Hi ' + test1 + ' ' + test2 + '.';

// shorthand
const welcome = `Hi ${test1} ${test2}`;

21. 多行字符串

// longhand
const lorem =
  'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur\n\t' +
  'adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt\n\t' +
  'ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim\n\t' +
  'veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris\n\t' +
  'nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute\n\t' +
  'irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse.\n\t';

//shorthand
const lorem = `Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
    adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt
    ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim
    veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris
    nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute
    irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse.`;

22. 对象属性简写

let test1 = 'a';
let test2 = 'b';

// longhand
let obj = { test1: test1, test2: test2 };

// shorthand
let obj = { test1, test2 };

23. 字符串转数字

// longhand
let test1 = parseInt('123');
let test2 = parseFloat('12.3');

// shorthand
let test1 = +'123';
let test2 = +'12.3';

24. 解构

// longhand
const test1 = this.data.test1;
const test2 = this.data.test2;
const test3 = this.data.test3;

// shorthand
const { test1, test2, test3 } = this.data;

25. Array.find

const data = [
  { type: 'test1', name: 'abc' },
  { type: 'test2', name: 'def' },
  { type: 'test1', name: 'ghi' },
];

function findtest1(name) {
  for (let i = 0; i < data.length; ++i) {
    if (data[i].type === 'test1' && data[i].name === name) {
      return data[i];
    }
  }
}

// shorthand
filteredData = data.find(
  (data) => data.type === 'test1' && data.name === 'fgh'
);
console.log(filteredData); // { type: 'test1', name: 'ghi' }

26. 检索条件

// longhand
if (type === 'test1') {
  test1();
} else if (type === 'test2') {
  test2();
} else if (type === 'test3') {
  test3();
} else if (type === 'test4') {
  test4();
} else {
  throw new Error('Invalid value ' + type);
}

// shorthand
var types = {
  test1: test1,
  test2: test2,
  test3: test3,
  test4: test4,
};

var func = types[type];
!func && throw new Error('Invalid value ' + type);
func();

27. 按位索引

The bitwise(~) operator will return a truthy value for anything but -1. Negating it is as simple as doing !~.

// longhand
if (arr.indexOf(item) > -1) {
  // item found
}

if (arr.indexOf(item) === -1) {
  // item not found
}

// shorthand
if (~arr.indexOf(item)) {
  // item found
}

if (!~arr.indexOf(item)) {
  // item not found
}

28. Object.entries()

将对象转化为数组

const data = { test1: 'abc', test2: 'cde', test3: 'efg' };
const arr = Object.entries(data);
console.log(arr);

/** Output:
 * [ ['test1', 'abc'],
 *   ['test2', 'cde'].
 *   ['test3', 'efg']
 * ]
 */

29. Object.values()

[ES8] 类似 Object.entries(), 不含 key

const data = { test1: 'abc', test2: 'cde' };
const arr = Object.values(data);
console.log(arr);

/** Output:
 * [ 'abc', 'cde' ]
 * /

30. 双按位非运算 ~~

!~~ 仅适用于 32 位整型

// longhand
Math.floor(1.9) === 1; // true

// shorthand
~~1.9 === 1; // true

31. 重复字符串

// longhand
let test = '';
for (let i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
  test += 'test ';
}
console.log(test); // test test test test test

// shorthand
'test '.repeat(5);

32. 数组中最大最小值

const arr = [1, 2, 3];
Math.max(...arr); // 3
Math.min(...arr); // 1

33. 字符串中的某个字符

let str = 'abc';
// longhand
str.charAt(2); // c

// shorthand
str[2]; // c

34. 次方

// longhand
Math.pow(2, 3); // 8

// shorthand
2 ** 3; // 8
